5 out of 5 stars5 of 5 stars

Reviewed on 1/27/2020

Hi, my experience was really really good. She's very attentive the physician was pleasant. The whole time we were speaking in terms of, you know, listening and, you know encouraging feedback and just engaging very knowledgeable about this practice and diagnosis and what next steps to take to treat my condition. Thank you.

Reviewed on 1/23/2020

During my visit with Dr. Goldberg, I found him to be very very extremely pleasant. With him I had a very positive experience. I enjoyed him. I love meeting him and I'm looking forward to continuing my health care with him. I'm looking forward to this doctor being my permanent doctor.

Dr. Goldberg was patient, kind & understanding of my situation. He offered valuable insight & information about my condition & was incredibly respectful & compassionate. I would definitely recommend him to family, friends & anyone who asks.
